title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8146.30 - Town of Erwin
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8146.30 - Town of Erwin

State Regulations
(a) Route 417. Route 417 between Route 15, exit 3, and the Corning Glass Works terminal, a
distance of 0.86 mile. (b) CR 417. CR 417 between Route 15, exit 3, and the Corning Glass Works terminal, a
distance of 0.50+- mile. (c) Robert

Dann Boulevard. Robert Dann Boulevard between Route 15, exit 4, and Corning

Glass Works Sullivan Park terminal, a distance of 0.7+- mile. (d) Canada Road. Canada Road between Robert

Dann Boulevard and Corning Glass Works Canada Road terminal, a distance of
1.0+- mile. Notes
